name: Ball Helix Tower
description:
Touch the Box Helix Jump screen and avoid obstacles.
Make the crazy ball jump and reach the highest level.
It is a very addictive free game. Jump and complete the labyrinth of square pieces.
Simple controls, simply slide your fingers to the right and left to rotate the helix, the ball jumps itself. Try to avoid the boxes of different color to the helix and let the ball through the holes.

Now with 7 Languages:
Chinese
Spanish
French
English
German
Portuguese
Russian

Features of Box Helix jump:

* Free game
* Up to 500 levels!
* Smooth and precise control
* All levels are different, created procedurally with random seed.
* Easy to play game with one-touch controls
* Good rock music and intense sound effects.
* Beautiful graphics of the labyrinth of the propeller tower with fog effect.
* Small size of the game, to download in a short time.
